name: PayMeTweets
overview:
PayMeTweets is a â€œMicro-Promotionalâ€ tool made for Twitterers.

With PayMeTweets, Twitterers can sell their influence on Twitter by selecting and RTing tweets submitted by others to PayMeTweets. To do this you simply follow PayMeTweets on Twitter and RT what you like.

Benefits to influence sellers: 1- Easy to do, just follow PayMeTweets and RT for pay 2- It’s safe, sellers do not give up control of their tweet stream 3- Easy to manage, sellers decide what to RT and when 4- No guessing, sellers know exactly how much they are being paid for their RT 5- No waiting, sellers are paid when they make the tweet 6- It creates real value, PayMeTweets automatically calculates the value of an RT based on a seller’s influence and pays accordingly 7- It’s fair, 90% of the payment goes to the sellers, not ad agencies or search engines or peripheral web pages 8- Your protected, PayMeTweets uses OAuth 9- It has built in anti-spamming technology to keep users online presence clean 10- It’s a tweet exchange, sellers can use the money earned from their RTs to promote their own Twitter content

Benefits to influence buyers: 1- Easy to use, buyers just add funds and submit their tweets to PayMeTweets 2- It’s affordable, buyers can start with as little as $23 3- Buyers don’t pay if their tweets are not RTd 4- Buyers get detailed feedback on each of their listings including who RTd it, how much each RT cost, as well as the CPM rate 5- Buyers promotional tweets are placed in the tweet streams of influential twitterers 6- It has built in anti-spamming technology to keep the value of the paid for RTs high 7- It’s fair, RTs are paid according to the seller’s influence
